Welcome to LifeSportsUSA, a new premium field sports and healthy lifestyle experience for youth and adults.

SUBSCRIBE for News & Updates

Comprehensive Sports Experience

Team play, sports camps and clinics, speed/agility/skills training, national and regional tournaments, guest coaches and speakers

State-of-the-art Fields

Featuring the newest generation turf, indoor/outdoor climate-controlled, illuminated environments for lacrosse, field hockey and soccer

Advance Technology

On-site, fully functioning broadcast studio, and the latest display and digital technology throughout the facility

Guest Amenities

An array of services supporting the healthy lifestyle: wellness and sports medicine, cafe and ancillary retail, along with special programming like Mommy & Me classes and TV studio experiences
